scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const src=path.join('node_modules','pdfjs-dist','build','pdf.worker.min.mjs');const dest=path.join('public','pdf.worker.min.mjs');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);console.log('✅ PDF worker copied to public folder');}else{console.log('⚠️ PDF worker not found, will use CDN');}"
